text: Day 53: The COVAX facility released its #covid19 #vaccine allocations for Q1/Q2. Where we work, allocations equal about 6% of adult population. Progress, but not impact yet. Health workers still working unprotected. So @VillageReach will keep counting.  https://t.co/oCd5pfU9EG https://t.co/1pmkIb2JgT
